label: water
caption: A black dog, its fur glistening with water droplets, can be seen sprinting towards the shore as it playsfully runs along the edge of a serene lake on a sunny afternoon. The calm surface of the water reflects the vibrant blue sky above, creating a sense of tranquility amidst the energetic scene. In the background, tall trees lean in over the lake's edge, their branches swaying gently in the breeze.
